meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Far</kanji> <kanji>feet</kanji> are feet that have gone on long <vocabulary>excursions</vocabulary>. These feet have been on some <vocabulary>trip</vocabulary>s, man. They've seen some things.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
